title: Tech, megacap growth shares boost Wall St; Twitter surges - Reuters.com
content: Tech, megacap growth shares boost Wall St; Twitter surges  Reuters.com
description: Wall Street's main indexes rose on Monday, boosted by megacap tech and growth stocks and a surge in Twitter after Elon Musk revealed his stake in the company, amid cautionary signals in the bond market and talk of more sanctions against Russia over Ukraine.
